alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 4:00AM CDT until July 16 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 400 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Elsmere, or 26 miles southwest of Ainsworth, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elsmere, Purdum, Hawley Flats, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Koshopah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
